text: Helen Lewis was a Canadian film editor who worked in the British film industry in the 1920s through the 1940s; early on in her career, she frequently worked with director Josef von Sternberg. Her first known credit was on 1928's The Dragnet. Her date of death is unknown. == Selected filmography == * Mother and Her Child (1947) * Coal Face, Canada (1943) * Talk of the Devil (1936) * Lady in Danger (1934) * Turkey Time (1933) * A Cuckoo in the Nest (1933) * Wives Beware (1932) * Thunderbolt (1929) * The Case of Lena Smith (1929) * The Docks of New York (1928) * The Dragnet (1928) == References == == External links == * Category:Canadian film editors Category:Women film editors Category:1898 births Category:Year of death missing
title: Helen Lewis (film editor)
